title: Eighteen Footers [Greek version]
creator_credit: Jack Rogers, Richard Mason and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: This film depicts sailing on Sydney Harbour in the locally designed eighteen foot open skiffs, fast four-man craft with unrestricted sail area. Describes the standard design and its evolution and shows the boats in action in a race illustrating handling technique
creator_credit_for_label: Jack Rogers, Richard Mason and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
